name: EUB Chain
description: The establishment of the fire chain is based on the concept of cloud computing, using the idle resources of the whole network to form a decentralized distributed cloud computing infrastructure network, which is both IaaS (Basic as a Service) and PaaS (Platform as a Service), subverting the existing centralized The value distribution method of cloud computing reduces the threshold for cloud computing to enter the threshold of various industries, and greatly reduces the cost of cloud computing. EUBC is the cryptocurrency, which can highlight WFC°Øs volume of trade and further value in the market. This an encrypted currency and play a critical role in whole WFC. This can be used to pay off the contribution made by the contributor and handling fee as well.
